title: Episode 239: Who Ultimately Pays a Tax?
itunes:title: Episode 239: Who Ultimately Pays a Tax?
description:
In an interesting twist of economics, it turns out that governments have no control over who ultimately pays a tax. Politicians can say they’re taxing consumers or taxing producers or taxing anyone else, but the market decides who ultimately pays the tax. And there’s nothing politicians can do to stop it.

 

Get Your Copy of Cooperation and Coercion Now!

http://www.cooperationandcoercion.com
